name: Join Robots
description:
This is my first game-jam game and was made for the Brackeys game-jam 2021 in a week using the Godot game engine.

It is a two-player puzzle-platformer and there are two robots each controlled with WASD or arrow keys. If the robots go close to each other, they merge and cannot be killed by enemies. However, one of the robots goes on top, making you taller and sometimes blocking you from entering certain places, adding an immensely enjoyable element of puzzle along with the already-entertaining platforming aspect.

When the two robots are merged together, one of you will move left and right while the other jumps, forcing you to work together in an attempt to reach the end.
